scripts.build: mkdir -p capacitor-web && cp *.html *.json *.js *.css capacitor-web/ && cp -r assets/icons capacitor-web/icons && cp -r assets/backgrounds capacitor-web/assets/backgrounds && cp -r assets/coins capacitor-web/assets/coins && cp -r assets/meanings capacitor-web/assets/meanings
scripts.cap:clean: rm -rf android && npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.full-build: npm run build && npm run icons && npx cap sync android
